name: 統計與實驗設計
description: On completion of this course, participants will have:  -- developed a critical awareness and understanding of elementary-intermediate statistical knowledge to carry out their independent research project at postgraduate level.
goals: To learn some commonly used statistical techniques
To apply these techniques in describing and analyzing data
To gain an appreciation for analytical skills
syllabus:
1  Orientation & Overview

2  Measures of Central Locations

3  Measure of Variation

4  Sampling Distribution

5  Sampling Distribution

6  Estimation

7  Estimation

8  Hypothesis Tests

9  Mid-Term Exam

10 Hypothesis Tests

11 Chi-square (χ2)

12 Correlation & Regression

13 Correlation & Regression

14 Univariate ANOVA & Post-hoc comparisons

15 Univariate ANOVA & Post-hoc comparisons

16 SPSS

17 SPSS

18  Final Exam
